name: Downward Dog
description: An essential pose that stretches the entire body and strengthens the arms and legs.

name: Adho Mukha Svanasana
description: Downward Dog: An essential pose that stretches the entire body and strengthens the arms and legs.

name: Utkatasana
description: Chair Pose: A strengthening pose that engages the legs, core, and arms.

description: Triangle Pose: A pose that stretches the legs, hips, and spine, and opens the chest and shoulders.
